name: Noche de Alebrijes
description:
Noche de Alebrijes is a rhythm shoot'em up,
developed by 10 CNAM-ENJMIN students from France.

Shoot your enemies in the tempo,
explode the combo gauge,
finish the musical level in the rythm and
hoist your name on the top of the leaderboard !

Controls : 

  • Move with WASD / Arrows / Joystick.
  • Shoot with SPACEBAR / Left click / A Button.

Our team :

  • Manager: William "TheFuel" Désert
  • Sound designer: Marc Enciso
  • Game designer: Brutalibre
  • Game designer: Margot Mathieu
  • Programmer: Sekamelica
  • Programmer: Youé Graillot
  • Programmer: Jordan "Kraghan" Bas
  • UI/UX designer: Mathieu Bouchet
  • 2D artist: Jeanne Prigent
  • 2D artist: Meghan "TharinMagem" Martin
